page.title: 03Playground Games at School
page.content: British Bull Dogs is a game that the boys play in the playground. The rules are as follows. Someone is picked to try to catch the people who run across the playground.Those that are caught help to catch others and so on. The person who is left is the winner. The game is exciting and fast because you have to run very quickly to beat the person in the middle. The girls like playing Elastics. Two children stand about 2 metres apart with the elastic stretched around their ankles. Another child has to jump in and out without tripping up if that is successful the elastic is moved up the body to the knees and so on. It gets much harder the higher the elastic goes.
